name: Miner Demo (0.1)
description:
"Miner" is a simple new mining game I have been working on.  There are randomly generated ore throughout one map I have designed.  Gather enough ore to get all three keys to get out of the mines. When you run out of things to mine, simply go back to the respawn tile and a new cave system will generate!  I am hoping to add enemies, more maps, CONTROLLER SUPPORT, power ups, new art(and better), and many more features in the future.  Hope you enjoy this short demo of my game.

Minimum Requirements:

i3-7100U with Integrated Graphics was fine. This is the lowest machine I have run this on with flawless playback. if you play this on something worse and it works well. PLEASE tell me your specs and we will update this accordingly. Thanks.

Feedback appreciated and much needed.
